headline.main: Thai King Strips Monastic Title From Wanted Buddhist Abbot
headline.print_headline: Thai King Strips Monastic Title From Wanted Buddhist Abbot

lead_paragraph: A Buddhist abbot whom police are seeking to arrest for accepting donations of embezzled money has been stripped of a royally bestowed religious title.
snippet: A Buddhist abbot whom police are seeking to arrest for accepting donations of embezzled money has been stripped of a royally bestowed religious title....
